Parameshwara defended his approach, stating he avoids speculation without complete information and urged media to report mistakes internally before publicizing them.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/idontknowhomeminister-goes-viral-g-parameshwara-tells-trolls-to-find-out-who-is-the-best/articleshow/123338015.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/bengaluru/idontknowhomeminister-goes-viral-g-parameshwara-tells-trolls-to-find-out-who-is-the-best/articleshow/123338015.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 23:51:52 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="34000" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123338012,imgsize-34000.cms"/></item><item><title>Asia Cup | Batting for continuity? He emphasizes impactful plays on every ball and values all-rounders for increased flexibility.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-batting-for-continuity-for-head-coach-gautam-gambhir-its-all-about-the-result/articleshow/123341995.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/asia-cup/asia-cup-batting-for-continuity-for-head-coach-gautam-gambhir-its-all-about-the-result/articleshow/123341995.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 09:29:41 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ARANI BASU</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="116514" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123342009,imgsize-116514.cms"/></item><item><title>‘82% stake sold’: Tesla exec offloads shares; Musk renews short seller threat</title><description><![CDATA[Tesla's Tom Zhu has sold over 82% of his Tesla shares since 2023. Musk has clashed with Bill Gates over Gates' alleged short position against Tesla. This position reportedly cost Gates $1.5 billion.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tesla-senior-vp-sells-82-shares-ceo-elon-musk-says-if-they-dont-they-will-be/articleshow/123330910.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/tesla-senior-vp-sells-82-shares-ceo-elon-musk-says-if-they-dont-they-will-be/articleshow/123330910.cms</guid><pubDate>Sat, 16 Aug 2025 12:48:11 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="400038" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123330906,imgsize-400038.cms"/></item><item><title>Padma Shri awardee Bula Choudhury robbed: 150 medals, mementos stolen</title><description><![CDATA[Former Indian swimmer Bula Choudhury, also known as the 'Queen of Seas,' suffered a devastating loss as thieves broke into her Hindmotor house and stole over 150 medals and mementos, including her Padma Shri brooch and 10 SAF Games gold medals. IndiGo stated the aircraft will undergo necessary inspections and repairs before resuming operations, prioritizing safety.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/indigo-aircraft-suffers-tail-strike-during-go-around-in-mumbai-in-heavy-rain/articleshow/123335275.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/mumbai/indigo-aircraft-suffers-tail-strike-during-go-around-in-mumbai-in-heavy-rain/articleshow/123335275.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 07:30:46 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="24778" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341203,imgsize-24778.cms"/></item><item><title>'WhatsApp Screen Mirroring Fraud': How this scam happens; Simple tips to protect yourself from it</title><description><![CDATA[A sophisticated WhatsApp screen mirroring scam is targeting users, with fraudsters posing as bank employees to gain access to personal and financial data. AstraZeneca launches FluMist Home nasal spray delivery</title><description><![CDATA[AstraZeneca introduces FluMist Home, offering a needle-free flu vaccine delivered directly to your door. This incident follows another student suicide at the same university last month, raising concerns about student well-being and support systems.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/sharda-student-dies-by-suicide-requests-fee-refund-in-note/articleshow/123338989.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/sharda-student-dies-by-suicide-requests-fee-refund-in-note/articleshow/123338989.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 02:52:31 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ADVITYA BAHL AND AYANTIKA PAL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1528109" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123340967,imgsize-1528109.cms"/></item><item><title>3-time NBA champion honours Magic Johnson with emotional 66th birthday tribute</title><description><![CDATA[Magic Johnson celebrated his 66th birthday on August 14, 2025, receiving heartfelt tributes, notably from former Lakers teammate Byron Scott. The celebration extended beyond basketball achievements, underscoring Johnson's leadership, mentorship, and lasting friendships.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/3-time-nba-champion-honors-magic-johnson-with-emotional-66th-birthday-tribute/articleshow/123323228.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/nba/top-stories/3-time-nba-champion-honors-magic-johnson-with-emotional-66th-birthday-tribute/articleshow/123323228.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 15 Aug 2025 19:28:14 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>RAUNAK BOSE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="51392" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123323251,imgsize-51392.cms"/></item><item><title>Dewald Brevis: The AB de Villiers copycat, who has found his own wind</title><description><![CDATA[With a blistering century backed by a fiery fifty, 22-year-old Dewald Brevis has arrived on the international arena in style. Just like his childhood hero, AB de Villiers, Brevis can play the lap shot, scoop, switch hit, ramp, and reverse sweep. He is finally showing his class, and his coach Deon Botes, who also coached De Villiers and Faf du Plessis, shares how the child prodigy battled his dark phase and turned it around by going back to the basics.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dewald-brevis-the-ab-de-villiers-copycat-who-has-found-his-own-wind/articleshow/123341251.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/dewald-brevis-the-ab-de-villiers-copycat-who-has-found-his-own-wind/articleshow/123341251.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 07:41:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>PRATYUSH RAJ</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57984" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341327,imgsize-57984.cms"/></item><item><title>Inside Alaska summit: Gifts, menus and missed ceasefire</title><description><![CDATA[A leaked document revealed quirky details of the planned Trump-Putin meeting in Alaska, including a bald eagle statue gift and pronunciation guides. While a filet mignon lunch was scrapped, the summit shifted focus from a ceasefire to a broader peace deal. Zelensky's upcoming White House visit will address Putin's proposal for Ukraine to cede territory in exchange for international peacekeepers.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/inside-alaska-summit-gifts-menus-and-missed-ceasefire-what-happened-in-meeting-between-donald-trump-and-vladimir-putin/articleshow/123340793.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/us/inside-alaska-summit-gifts-menus-and-missed-ceasefire-what-happened-in-meeting-between-donald-trump-and-vladimir-putin/articleshow/123340793.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 07:05:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19540" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341011,imgsize-19540.cms"/></item><item><title>Fast Lane Ahead! PM to inaugurate two Delhi-NCR NH projects- 10 things to know</title><description><![CDATA[Prime Minister Narendra Modi is set to inaugurate the Delhi section of the Dwarka Expressway and the Urban Extension Road-II, projects worth nearly Rs 11,000 crore. These initiatives aim to decongest Delhi, improve connectivity, and significantly reduce travel time between key locations like the Singhu border and IGI Airport, while also lowering pollution.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/infrastructure/fast-lane-ahead-pm-modi-inaugurate-dwarka-expressways-delhi-section-and-uer-ii-projects-today-route-cost-connectivity-10-things-to-know/articleshow/123341532.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/infrastructure/fast-lane-ahead-pm-modi-inaugurate-dwarka-expressways-delhi-section-and-uer-ii-projects-today-route-cost-connectivity-10-things-to-know/articleshow/123341532.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 08:37:12 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI BUSINESS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1942129" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123341682,imgsize-1942129.cms"/></item><item><title>Uncertainty over US-India trade deal as August talks put off</title><description><![CDATA[The Trump administration has introduced new uncertainty into the bilateral trade deal with India by postponing scheduled meetings, leaving Indian authorities awaiting clarity. A deadline looms for potential doubling of tariffs on Indian exports to the US. This situation is further complicated by existing tariffs and proposed secondary sanctions related to India's trade with Russia.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/uncertainty-over-trade-deal-with-us-as-aug-talks-put-off/articleshow/123339758.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/uncertainty-over-trade-deal-with-us-as-aug-talks-put-off/articleshow/123339758.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 04:18:06 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SIDHARTHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="108772" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123339770,imgsize-108772.cms"/></item><item><title>SC's interference in Prez-guv powers will destabilise power balance: Govt</title><description><![CDATA[The Centre has strongly criticized the Supreme Court's ruling on deadlines for presidential and gubernatorial assent to bills, arguing it unconstitutionally infringes on the powers of these high offices. The government contends that judicial review of assent procedures could destabilize the balance of power among the legislature, executive, and judiciary.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/scs-interference-in-prez-guv-powers-will-destabilise-power-balance-govt/articleshow/123340091.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/scs-interference-in-prez-guv-powers-will-destabilise-power-balance-govt/articleshow/123340091.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 05:05:09 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DHANANJAY MAHAPATRA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="57100" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123340108,imgsize-57100.cms"/></item><item><title>'Moment of pride': Shubhanshu Shukla, India's 2nd astronaut, returns home</title><description><![CDATA[Group Captain Shubhanshu Shukla, India's second astronaut, returned home after successfully completing Nasa's Axiom-4 mission, landing in India on Sunday. He was greeted by Union Minister Jitendra Singh and Delhi CM Rekha Gupta, along with his wife, Kamna Shukla. Shukla's mission, which included 18 days on the ISS, provides valuable experience for India's Gaganyaan program.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/moment-of-pride-shubhanshu-shukla-indias-2nd-astronaut-returns-home/articleshow/123339465.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/moment-of-pride-shubhanshu-shukla-indias-2nd-astronaut-returns-home/articleshow/123339465.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 03:40:53 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="112894" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123339603,imgsize-112894.cms"/></item><item><title>Watch: Back with a bang! Despite the unfortunate events, a troupe successfully formed a 10-tier pyramid thrice for the first time.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2-die-95-injured-during-mum-dahi-handi-festivities/articleshow/123340338.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/2-die-95-injured-during-mum-dahi-handi-festivities/articleshow/123340338.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 17 Aug 2025 05:39:07 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TNN</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="378040" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123340345,imgsize-378040.cms"/></item><item><title>Hurricane Erin 2025 intensifies to category five storm: Which US states on alert; safety tips issued</title><description><![CDATA[Hurricane Erin 2025 rapidly intensified into a Category 5 storm, posing threats to the Caribbean and the US East Coast.       <title><![CDATA[India-China direct flights resumption likely to boost trade, tourism and economic ties]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/business/aviation/india-china-flights-resumption-economic-ties-impact-19653647.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[India and China are set to resume direct passenger flights after five years, a move expected to boost trade, tourism, and economic ties. The resumption comes amid growing diplomatic engagement, recent trade approvals, and ahead of Prime Minister Modi’s visit to China for the SCO Summit. Pre-pandemic, over 8 lakh passengers traveled annually between the two countries, with cargo flows also significant. Restoring direct flights is likely to reignite strong demand, supporting business, tourism, and people-to-people exchanges.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Early growth investment fund, Atomic Capital, has announced the final close of its maiden fund at ₹400 crore, targeting early growth-stage consumer startups in India.       <description><![CDATA[As part of the deal, Infosys will acquire 75% of the shareholding in Versent Group, a wholly owned subsidiary of Telstra and a leading digital transformation solutions provider in Australia.       <title><![CDATA[Need a functional IBC framework, not court-dependent solutions, say experts]]></title>
      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/economy/india-ibc-reforms-functional-framework-courts-experts-19653521.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[Experts say proposed changes to the Insolvency and Bankruptcy Code will only work if backed by a functional framework, not left to court-driven resolutions. While the bill aims to speed up timelines, enable out-of-court settlements, and give lenders a bigger role, SC Garg and Kumar Saurabh Singh warn that effective implementation will be key to avoiding delays and misuse.]]></description>

      <description><![CDATA[Pronto, a real-time domestic help app, has raised $11 million in Series A funding to expand its 10-minute household help service to cities like Mumbai and Bengaluru. Shares of Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd ended at ₹2,020.30, down by ₹31.15, or 1.52%, on the BSE.]]></description>
